relevant_findings.description: Document discusses Cuban-American intelligence networks and potential recruitment
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Ex-Captain in the U.S.A.F. See Pgs 201 for full details
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests potential intelligence community connections that could relate to Oswald's background

relevant_findings.description: Detailed notes about Cuban intelligence and anti-Castro activities
relevant_findings.direct_quote: Planning to send him to Nicaragua, and I have recommended his to the Nicaragua desk
relevant_findings.significance: Indicates complex intelligence operations involving Cuba during the period of Oswald's activities

relevant_findings.description: Secret CIA document discussing recruitment and operational details
relevant_findings.direct_quote: In my mind he is the ideal type of Latin American agent. It will be a real loss to more dedicated and more loyal
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals internal CIA assessment of recruitment and operational strategies
